title: Episode 0 Introduction to History on Fire Podcast
dc:creator: Daniele Bolelli
description: In this quick intro, we explore the guiding philosophy of the podcast, Dan Carlin’s influence, and future plans.
content:encoded:
In this quick intro, we explore the guiding philosophy of the podcast, Dan Carlin’s influence, and future plans.

Please support our sponsors by shopping for supplements, special foods, clothing, and exercise equipment at www.onnit.com/history and receive a 10% discount. Also, if you are in the market for coffee, please consider doing business at Kimera Koffee and use the code “history” at checkout for a 10% discount.

Discounts exclusive to our listeners are also available on hemp gear using the code “daniele” at www.dsgear.com, and on clothing using the code “warrior” at www.suredesigntshirts.com
